channel.title: [Project Insanity] Hosting online
channel.description: I have followed numerous amounts of tutorials on how to make a server online. so I have no-ip working and all 3 green ticks and selected host. I have portforwaded with utorrent to port 43594. In my [Pi] in the server.java I have changed the ip to bmacker.no-ip.biz but when people try and connect it says server is offline. I have been trying to get it online for 2 months now please help!

item.title: [Project Insanity] Hosting online
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

there is nothing wrong with using utorrent, i use it and i have no problems, just make sure when you go to run your server turn utorrent off completely because it runs on 43594 which will cause a port interferance. so it will not turn online.

Read full topic

item.title: [Project Insanity] Hosting online
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

A lot of people don’t understand everything that goes wrong when you portforward with utorrent.
you get “unable to connect to server- please try a different world”
and some people dont change the settings on their router.
It’s a lot easier to make a firewall exception

Read full topic

item.title: [Project Insanity] Hosting online
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

dont use utorrent use your router!

Read full topic
